rounds.name: Round 1: Red Light, Green Light.
rounds.intro: ♫ Mugunghwa Kkoci Pieot Seumnida ( 무궁화 꽃 이 피었 습니다 ) ♫
deaths: {{DYING}} saw Winter's vampiric build and took an extra step backwards.
After stopping, Coffee's coffee spilled on {{DYING}}, who jumped and was slaughtered midair.

rounds.name: Round 2: Sugar Honeycombs
rounds.intro: The shape you have chosen is the shape you must remove from the honeycomb.
deaths: {{DYING}} was given the shape of Uggs and died on the bottom Ugg
With sweaty hands, {{DYING}} died after chipping off Saerebrum's first tentacle

rounds.name: Round 3: Tug of War
deaths: Team {{DYING}} tried to reforge their stamina to health but should have put some points in strength instead.
Instead of picking triple extort builds, team {{DYING}} went all DPS and paid the ultimate price.

rounds.name: Round 4: Marbles
rounds.intro: Using your set of ten marbles, play the game of your choice with your partner. The player who manages to take all ten marbles from their partner wins.
deaths: Juniper's scream stunned {{DYING}}, and they were eliminated after Juniper casually scooped up all the marbles
{{DYING}} partnered with JoeBu, who secretly deployed many Flunders to deflect all the marbles into their own pouch

rounds.name: Round 5: Glass Stepping Stones
rounds.intro: Choose a jacket with a number from 1 to 16.
deaths: {{DYING}} tried to jump across five steps in one go, landed on tempered glass, but still fell through due to the weight of their tank build.
{{DYING}} couldn't handle the pressure and jumped outside the playing area

rounds.name: Final Round: Squid Game
rounds.intro: Any kind of combat or violence is allowed in Squid Game.
deaths: {{DYING}} attempted to tackle their opponent but slipped and hit their head, ending the games in a very anticlimactic way.
{{DYING}} decided to honorably end their own life and let {{LIVING}} win.
